```{r}
#Loading Libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(GGally)
```

```{r}
#View Data
names(diamonds)
dim(diamonds)
summary(diamonds)
head(diamonds)
tail(diamonds)
skimr::skim(diamonds)
```


```{r}
# Make a pairplot
GGally::ggpairs(diamonds)
```

```{r}
# Make a histogram
ggplot(data = diamonds, aes(x = carat)) +
  geom_histogram()

```
